partnerDetails.about:
Robers & Brandt Elektrotechnik GmbH has been building transformers for more than 30 years. Our production sites are Langerwehe, near Aachen and Limburg an der Lahn. In terms of infrastructure, both locations are very well connected with the A3 and A4 motorways right on the doorstep.
Robers & Brandt Elektrotechnik GmbH sees itself as a partner and problem solver for the market. Many of our inductors have been created in direct cooperation with our customers. This leads to very decisive advantages. Customers get very individual devices and at a very fair price.
The classic control transformer is just as much a part of our product range as specially developed high-current transformers with secondary currents of a few kiloamps.
We offer you:
  • Isolation and control transformers
  • Three-phase transformers; of course also as auto-transformers
  • High power transformers
  • Transformers for medical use
  • Reactors
  • Special developments
